<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.DonationBadgeHandler</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DonationBadgeHandler</name><script><![CDATA[var DonationBadgeHandler = Class.create();
DonationBadgeHandler.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    // Function to award badge when auction_status changes to auction_scheduled
    awardBadgeOnAuctionScheduled: function(donationId) {
        var donationGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_item'); // Replace 'item_donation' with your donation table name
        if (donationGR.get(donationId)) {
            // Check if auction_status changed to auction_scheduled
            if (donationGR.auction_status == 'auction_scheduled') {
                // Get the donor (assuming 'donor' is a reference field to User table)
                var donor = donationGR.donator;
                
                // Create a new record in the User Badges table
                var userBadge = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_badges'); // Replace 'x_user_badges' with your actual table name
                userBadge.initialize(); // Initialize the record
                
                // Set fields on the User Badges record
                userBadge.user = donator; // Set the donor as the user who earned the badge
                userBadge.badge_name = 'Donation Badge'; // Set the name of the badge
                userBadge.date_awarded = new GlideDateTime(); // Set the date awarded to now
                
                // Insert the record
                var badgeID = userBadge.insert();
                gs.info('Badge awarded to User: ' + donator.getDisplayValue() + '. Badge ID: ' + badgeID);
            }
        }
    },

    type: 'DonationBadgeHandler'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-18 16:26:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>5432b71c932b821094e3f15a7bba10de</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DonationBadgeHandler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5432b71c932b821094e3f15a7bba10de</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-18 16:26:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
